premises: If the power supply is stable, then the circuit will function properly
incorrect conclusions: The circuit will not function properly
If the circuit functions properly, then the power supply is stable
If the circuit does not function properly, then the power supply is stable
If the power supply is not stable, then the circuit will not function properly

premises: If the coolant system is activated, then the engine temperature will decrease
incorrect conclusions: The engine temperature will not decrease
If the engine temperature decreases, then the coolant system is activated
If the engine temperature does not decrease, then the coolant system is activated
If the coolant system is not activated, then the engine temperature will not decrease

premises: If the software is updated, then the system performance will improve
incorrect conclusions: The system performance will not improve
If the system performance improves, then the software is updated
If the system performance does not improve, then the software is updated
If the software is not updated, then the system performance will not improve
